text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Add guidelines for the body. Outline Ash’s head.
Draw the shapes of Ash’s torso and neck.
Define with guidelines the arms, hands, ankles and feet of the boy. Add lines for his facial features.
Outline the shapes of Ash Ketchum’s arms, legs and cap.
Draw the hands, fingers, shoes. Add the cuff and the peak of the cap.
Add lines to the T-shirt. Draw Ash’s eyes, ears and hair. Detail his cap and shoes.
Work on the figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Ash Ketchum, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add more detail, add the ground. Erase all guidelines.
